sentences.en: A judgmental infelicity plagued past generations.
sentences.cn: 这种不恰当的看法曾困扰了几代人.

sentences.en: There is so much infelicity in the world.
sentences.cn: 人世间有很多不幸的事.

sentences.en: You will be surprised there is so much infelicity in the world.
sentences.cn: 你会感到惊讶世界上竟有这么多不幸的事情.

words.tran_cn: 不幸；不适当；不吉利（复数infelicities）

trans.tran_en: the state or quality of being unhappy or unfortunate
